meanings.definition: The quality or state of being homoscedastic
meanings.sent1: The homoscedasticities of the data points allowed for accurate predictions.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the homoscedasticities of the samples to ensure reliable results.
meanings.sent3: The homoscedasticities of the experiment were so consistent, it was almost boring!
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail created homoscedasticities in the project, making it a smooth process.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained homoscedasticities using a fun analogy involving balloons of the same size.

meanings.definition: The property of having constant variance
meanings.sent1: Understanding homoscedasticities is crucial for accurate statistical analysis.
meanings.sent2: The homoscedasticities of the measurements helped in drawing meaningful conclusions.
meanings.sent3: The homoscedasticities of the data were like a symphony of consistent values.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, homoscedasticities can indicate stability in the market.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing homoscedasticities is like picturing a row of identical houses along a street.
